entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
